declarations.comments: Constructs a `Rect` from four values
declarations.title: makeRect

declarations.comments: Get the length of a position vector
declarations.title: length

declarations.comments: Get the diagonal of a size
declarations.title: diagonal

declarations.comments:
Checks if a position is inside a region. Size of the region should be
positive. Inclusive on the lower bound, exclusive on the higher bound.
declarations.title: inside

declarations.comments: `inside`, but with its result negated.
declarations.title: outside

declarations.comments: Put a position inside a region by using the modulus operator
declarations.title: putInsideMod

declarations.comments: Get the area of a size
declarations.title: area

declarations.comments: Get the perimeter of a size
declarations.title: perimeter

declarations.comments: Get the ratio of a size by dividing the width by the height
declarations.title: ratio

declarations.comments: Get the center position of a region
declarations.title: midPos

declarations.comments: Get the dot product of two vectors
declarations.title: dot

declarations.comments: Check if two vectors are perpendicular
declarations.title: perpendicular

declarations.comments: Check if two vectors are parallel
declarations.title: parallel

declarations.comments: Turn a region into a `Rectangle`
declarations.title: toRectangleWith

declarations.comments: Turn a rection represented with `Number`s into a `Rectangle`
declarations.title: toRectangle

declarations.comments:
Class describing types which represent a position on a 2D plane and can be
turned into a `Vector2 a`.
declarations.title: ToPos

declarations.comments:
Class describing types which represent a position on a 2D plane and can be
constructed from a `Vector2 a`.
declarations.title: FromPos

declarations.comments:
Class describing types which represent a position on a 2D plane and can be
modified by any function of type `Vector2 a -> Vector2 a`.

Instances must satisfy the following law:

- Identity: `asPosEndo identity = identity`
declarations.title: AsPosEndo

declarations.comments:
Class describing types which represent a position on a 2D plane and can be
modified by any function of type `Vector2 a -> Vector2 b`.

Instances must satisfy the following law:

- Identity: `asPos identity = identity`
declarations.title: AsPos

declarations.comments:
Class describing types which represent a size on a 2D plane and can be
turned into a `Vector2 a`.
declarations.title: ToSize

declarations.comments:
Class describing types which represent a size on a 2D plane and can be
constructed from a `Vector2 a`.
declarations.title: FromSize

declarations.comments:
Class describing types which represent a size on a 2D plane and can be
modified by any function of type `Vector2 a -> Vector2 a`.

Instances must satisfy the following law:

- Identity: `asSizeEndo identity = identity`
declarations.title: AsSizeEndo

declarations.comments:
Class describing types which represent a size on a 2D plane and can be
modified by any function of type `Vector2 a -> Vector2 b`.

Instances must satisfy the following law:

- Identity: `asSize identity = identity`
declarations.title: AsSize

declarations.comments:
Class describing types which represent a rectangular region on a 2D plane
and can be turned into a `Rect a`.
declarations.title: ToRegion

declarations.comments:
Class describing types which represent a rectangular region on a 2D plane
and can be constructed from a `Rect a`.
declarations.title: FromRegion

declarations.comments:
Class describing types which represent a rectangular region on a 2D plane
and can be modified by any function of type `Rect a -> Rect a`.

Instances must satisfy the following law:

- Identity: `asRegionEndo identity = identity`
declarations.title: AsRegionEndo

declarations.comments:
Class describing types which represent a rectangular region on a 2D plane
and can be modified by any function of type `Rect a -> Rect b`.

Instances must satisfy the following law:

- Identity: `asRegion identity = identity`
declarations.title: AsRegion
